comment: The most khurafati namuna with "little little gand fati "me jeene wala nature. I'll miss those Upendra sir's classes with you. Thanks for being the most extroverted introvert👉👈.
name: Riya

comment: To the most loyal person I’ve ever met, and also the one with the softest ass. Ghar jaake bhi Rizz ke liye tere paas hi aunga. Btw 80 lene nhi dene hai tere ko. BLR meh milte aur AD ka khyal rakhna acche se 🙂. To the man who I can count on to finish the bottle….
name: Shrevesh

comment: “Crodie ek aur banau?” Jidhr bhi rhe crazy shit krenge bhai either it be bengaloduuu ya delhi. Will remember your advices sir🫡. Best of luck bhai aise hi macahte rehna!! They Not Like Us. 🐶
name: Anshuman Das

comment: Most carefree person I ever came across! Will miss our talks and influencing your decisions.. Aur introverted nature choddhke khulke baat krle. H**giri choddhde bro. All the best for your IIM journey!
name: Sreyashi

comment: 309 buddy, Gyaan dene kaa boht shauk hai. Dabaane kii ichha rakhne waala aur humesha bakchodi karne waala. Sarkaari Naukri karna aur motaa dahej lena. All the best for your future journey.
name: Prakhar Gautam

comment: Rich Boi of the group...MUN ke 15 din pehle aisa lag raha tha ki Event hi nhi ho raha...but eventually we managed it😂. So proud we made it to our desired IIMs together!!
name: Sahil Rapartiwar

comment:
Nachiket 
Iska sab "Ho jaayega" bolke ho bhi jaata hai. Working together was fun. All the Best for your future.
name: Khushi Gupta

comment: ‘Arre ho jayega tu tension mat le’ with the most impossible thing ever and then he manages to do it also- wo bhi bina stress liye. A fun person to be around, glad to have met you here!!
name: Akshita Mittal

comment: Anyone asks anything and Nachiket be like, "Aree tension mat lo, ho jayega" dude, how could you be so chill yet confident in civil 😂😂🫡 Don't lose ur cool and confidence and somehow sab kuch ho jayega, like the two lakhs due on ur no dues 🙃😂😂
name: K Madhumitha

comment:
Most extroverted introvert👉🏻👈🏻
Pura college "Darna nhi hai boys" wale attitude se nikal diya Sir aapne😂🙌🏻
Gonna miss all the bakaiti that we did throughout the college🫂
IIM Bangalore jaa kar toh thoda dhng ka fashion sense rkh lena🙃
Bhool Mt jana aur aage bhi milte rehna.
All the best🫂🙌🏻

comment:
A rich guy, not just in materialistic terms but also with confidence and attitude as well. We haven't spent much time during these years, but still inspired by your personality.
Best wishes for future
name: Sanskar Gupta

comment: Hi sir! Aap aur Sahil Bhaiya nahi hote to shayad maine bohot pehle back out kar liya hota MUN se, so thank you for keeping me afloat. Also aap ko graduation ke baad bhi khane ki photos bhejungi jab bhi kuch accha banaungi :)
name: Shagun Ghatak

comment: Secretary General of MUN 6.0! Thankyou for believing in me and passing your legacy to me!  I learnt from you how to stay calm in front of team even if things are not going right. Aap bhaut cool and amazing ho! All the best for future bhaiya ✨
name: Srishti Dhingra

comment: Nemesis will be remembered bhai, and tera wo valo clip also🤣🤣 My quarantine partner, that DA Road of fame🤣 bhai bhot maze kare yr. Uske baad still utna time nhi spend kiya but ab to IIM-B lesgoooo waha machayenge 🤜🤛 Apne kuch vichar waise milte julte the🤣🤣🤣All the best bhai, keep rocking.
name: Aryan Gupta

comment: “Are tension mat le ho jayega “ sala har baat pe reply yehi h iska . 😂😂 clg  k starting phase mai kitna hi ghume h apan . guest house aur narmada ki bakchodia , nainital bhi yad rahega . Atb bhai bangalore k liye 🫂
name: Harsh Parihar

comment: Hugs with ass press is always complimentary. Hardworking and always enjoying, Udipi jana, 309 k e saath veerji ka chaap khana, nandri trip was memorable. Bangalore me toh h ki toh milte rahenge. Bs shaadi me bulana mat bhoolna ek Lauta sober dost ko. Sutta peete samay bs gate band kr lena😂

comment: Guy with the most unique T-shirt colours😂 Congrats on IIMB, udhar ke fests me hi milenge aage. All the best for the future😁

comment: Ex jiju.Nachiket bhau, aap apne velvet shirts iim Bangalore me mat pehnna 😂. Abhi apni jd cola khareed lena Bangalore me khud. Atb for iimb.

comment: Best of luck for everything bro. Be happy and have fun.
